labels.label: Parse syslog message using PaloAlto's syslog template
Disabled on purpose - in debug situations, enable to log to disk

entry.value:
flowFile = session.get() if flowFile: sender = flowFile.getAttribute('syslog.sender') message = flowFile.getAttribute('syslog_message.0')
syslog_file=open('/data/remotelogs/{}.txt'.format(sender),'a+') syslog_file.write(message+'\n') syslog_file.close()
session.transfer(flowFile, REL_SUCCESS) session.commit()
